channel.title: Read This!
channel.description:
Hello everyone , this is a topic where im asking for help. Seriously , now listen up. This should be the right topic/section i think. Okay.. The problem is , the i want somebody to host my server . The servers has forums. We need 2 things from you. 1.You know how to code a little(like changing the name etc.) 2.To host the server , in ur computer
If ur interested , post here or send me a private message. Or just add me on AIM ImDaOwnage2008
I Hope somebody will help me .
Best wishes , ImDaOwnage
